attributes.action: Make all tax allowances transferable between married couples/civil partners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Married couples (especially those with children/care responsibilities) are losing out on their tax allowances.

Whilst many benefits are 'means tested' or calculated against the family as a whole, taxation is calculated on the individual.

Taxation should be calculated on the same basis as benefits and a married couple/civil partnership should be treated as a single entity with a combined (transferable) tax allowance.
